thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 21 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lootom Telcovideo Network Wuxi sees 2017 net profit down 0 pct to 20 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lootom Telcovideo Network Wuxi sees 2017 net profit down 0 pct to 20 pct

organizations.name: lootom telcovideo network wuxi co ltd

text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Lootom Telcovideo Network Wuxi Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to decrease by 0 percent to 20 percent, or to be 42.3 million yuan to 52.8 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 52.8 million yuan
* Says that decreased sales income, increased research and development costs and management fee as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/fY4EgV
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
